docs.snippet: Seven additional Latin-American nations declared themselves yesterday in favor of the United States proposal before the International Health Conference for main taining the Pan American Sanitary Bureau virtually as an autonomous body.

docs.snippet: Extension of the John Simon Guggenheim Memorial Foundation fellowships to five more South American countries, together with the award of twenty Latin-American fellowships amounting to $50,000, was announced yesterday.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 1--A plot by military and police elements to seize control in Uruguay--the democratic buffer state lying between Argentina and Brazil--has been smashed and its ringleaders arrested.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 1--A plot by military and police elements to seize control in Uruguay--the democratic buffer state lying between Argentina and Brazil--has been smashed and its ringleaders arrested.
docs.abstract: Plot to seize control of Pres Amezaga's Govt quelled; arrests announced; involvement of allegedly pro-Nazi Col Christi, police and mil elements noted; Chief of Police Vescobi discounts pol importance of plot
